price: Yeroo (obboleeyyan Yuusuf) jedhan: “Dhugumatti, Yuusufiifi obboleessi isaa nurra gara abbaa keenyaatti jaalatamoodha,odoo nuti garee taanee jirru, Dhugumatti, abbaan keenya dogoggora ifa bahaa keessa jira.
arabic: إِذۡ قَالُواْ لَيُوسُفُ وَأَخُوهُ أَحَبُّ إِلَىٰٓ أَبِينَا مِنَّا وَنَحۡنُ عُصۡبَةٌ إِنَّ أَبَانَا لَفِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: idh qālū layūsufu wa-akhūhu aḥabbu ilā abīnā minnā wanaḥnu ʿuṣ'batun inna abānā lafī ḍalālin mubīnin
